HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
The mod now adds the following butcher recipes;
 - Butcher animal
 - Butcher human
 - Butcher insect
 - Butcher animal or human
 - Butcher human or insect
 
 This is more versatile than the mod settings. As such, the mod settings have
 been removed. Each recipe counts only the type of meat in it's name.
 
 The original butcher recipe and any other custom butcher recipes from other mods
 will count ALL meat types. Please adjust your butcher table bills accordingly.
